## Description {#details}

This represents the llvm.coro.async.resume instruction.

During lowering this is replaced by the resume function of a suspend point (the continuation function).

Definition at line 395 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/coroutines/coroinstr-h">CoroInstr.h</a>.
